endemo2.general.country.Country¶

class Country(name, input_manager)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Country connects all sectors and data from a single country. It is a completely self-contained unit.

Parameters:

  • name – Name of the country.

  • input_manager – The input manager containing all the input files, so country can fill the variables in its constructor.

Variables:

  • _name (str) – The name of the country (en).

  • _abbreviations ([str]) – Possible abbreviations for this country.

  • _population (Population[PredictedTimeseries, NutsRegion]) – Population object, containing important data and timeseries of the countries’ population.

  • _gdp (TimeStepSequence) – The Timeseries for the GDP of this country.

  • _sectors (dict[SectorIdentifier, Sector]) – The sector objects for this country, accessible by the sector identifier.

Methods

Sum the demand over all sectors of the country.

Parameters:

year (int) – Target year for which the prediction should be calculated.

Return type:

containers.Demand

Returns:

The demand for a country summed over all sectors.

get_sector(sector_id)[source]¶

Getter for the sectors of a country. Accessed by the sectors’ identifier.

Parameters:

Return type:
